title: I got permanently banned for flaming
body: can u please unban my account i spent a lot of money and time on this account i will never ever say a world in game again i swear to god

replies.body: I'm sorry to bring bad news, but permanent bans are not lifted unless there is some error on Riot's end. You had multiple warnings in two chat restrictions and a 14 day ban (unless you showed zero-tolerance behavior that caused you to skip the chat restrictions), and the reform card for your 14 day ban specifically said that your next punishment would be a permanent ban. You should have listened to those warnings and stopped your behavior before the permanent ban.

> i will never ever say a world in game again i swear to god

You had plenty of warnings where you could have done that, instead you chose not to.
If you feel like the ban is undeserved you can send a ticket to the support
I would perma ban you for your name alone.
